content:
mattetti opened issue #3704:

Now that wasmtime supports AOT I suggest you update the "about" section of this project as well as the tags.

For context, I didn't realize that wasmtime was supporting AOT until I went to the Lucet repo where they mentioned AOT support in wasmtime! It might be nice to mention that on the website and README, since the only mention I found was buried there: https://docs.wasmtime.dev/cli-options.html#compile
